snippet: The Giants have scored a touchdown on just 44.7 percent of their trips into the red zone, 24th in the N.F.L.
abstract: New York Giants focus on improving their performance in the red-zone as team prepares to face Cincinnati Bengals; Giants have scored touchdowns on just 44.7 percent of their trips inside opponents' 20-yard line, 24th in NFL.
lead_paragraph: The Giants have scored a touchdown on just 44.7 percent of their trips into the red zone, 24th in the N.F.L.

headline.seo: Red Zone or Green Zone, Giants Have Trouble Reaching the End Zone
headline.main: Red Zone or Green Zone, Giants Have Trouble Reaching the End Zone
headline.print_headline: Red Zone or Green Zone, Giants Have Trouble Reaching the End Zone
